io.name: SARSFNDX0060101_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SARSFNDX0060101_inbound" /> <complexType name="SARSFNDX0060101_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="selfRrno"> <annotation> <documentation>본인주민등록번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="본인주민등록번호" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="13" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="acncYr"> <annotation> <documentation>회계년도</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: SARSFNDX0060101_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" <annotation> <documentation>전송일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> name="sendTime"> <annotation> <documentation>전송시간</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <element name="respCd"> <annotation> <documentation>응답코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="rrno"> <annotation> <documentation>주민등록번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="13" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="acncYr"> <annotation> <documentation>회계년도</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="ddctTgamt"> <annotation> <documentation>공제대상금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="19" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
